alerts.description:
At 859 AM EDT, radar indicated strong thunderstorms were located
along a line extending from Berlin to 6 miles west of Waterford to 6
miles southwest of Naples. Movement was north at 35 mph.

Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail are possible with
these storms.

Locations impacted include...
Berlin, Bridgton, Bethel, Rumford, Andover, Errol, Waterford,
Grafton, Dixville, Weld, Gorham, Harrison, Denmark, Lovell,
Greenwood, Chatham, Dummer, Hanover, Gilead and Byron.

Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms, and may
cause localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.
alerts.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:59AM EDT by NWS Gray ME
